languages.text: Отряд Лорд-капитана и свита Космических волков устремились в шахту, в самое сердце Машинного храма. Мы, занявшие оборону у створа ее, провожали их исполненными благоговения взглядами. Мы знали, что исход битвы за Ефрат-II зависит от них, как и наши судьбы.

The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.
languages.original_text: Отряд Лорд-капитана и свита Космических волков устремились в шахту, в самое сердце Машинного храма. Мы, занявшие оборону у створа ее, провожали их исполненными благоговения взглядами. Мы знали, что исход битвы за Ефрат-II зависит от них, как и наши судьбы.

We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

languages.text: 舰长大人的随行人员与太空野狼的狼群进入了深井，朝着机械大教堂的核心区域出发了。我们一边在入口区域设置防线，一边满怀敬意地目送他们离开。我们都很清楚，无论是欧夫拉茨二号星这场战役的真正结果，还是我们接下来的命运，都掌握在他们手中。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人的随行人员与太空野狼的狼群进入了深井，朝着机械大教堂的核心区域出发了。我们一边在入口区域设置防线，一边满怀敬意地目送他们离开。我们都很清楚，无论是欧夫拉茨二号星这场战役的真正结果，还是我们接下来的命运，都掌握在他们手中。

languages.text: L'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et les Space Wolves ont plongé dans le puits, en direction du cœur de la Cathédrale de la Machine. Nous les avons regardés partir avec admiration, tout en établissant un périmètre autour de l'entrée. Nous savions que la véritable issue de la bataille d'Euphrate-II reposait sur leurs épaules et que notre sort était entre leurs mains.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

traits.locale_text: L'entourage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et les Space Wolves ont plongé dans le puits, en direction du cœur de la Cathédrale de la Machine. Nous les avons regardés partir avec admiration, tout en établissant un périmètre autour de l'entrée. Nous savions que la véritable issue de la bataille d'Euphrate-II reposait sur leurs épaules et que notre sort était entre leurs mains.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの従者とスペースウルフの一団はシャフトに潜り込み、機械大聖堂の中心部へと向かった。我々は入り口の周囲を固めながら、彼らが去っていくのを畏敬の念をこめて見送った。ユーフラテス・IIの戦いの真の結末は彼ら次第であり、我々の運命も彼らが決めるのだと覚悟していた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの従者とスペースウルフの一団はシャフトに潜り込み、機械大聖堂の中心部へと向かった。我々は入り口の周囲を固めながら、彼らが去っていくのを畏敬の念をこめて見送った。ユーフラテス・IIの戦いの真の結末は彼ら次第であり、我々の運命も彼らが決めるのだと覚悟していた。

languages.text: El séquito d{mf|el|e la} Lord Capitán y la banda de Lobos Espaciales se adentraron en la galería, camino del corazón de la Catedral Máquina. Los vimos alejarse con reverencia mientras preparábamos un perímetro en torno a la entrada. Sabíamos que el verdadero resultado de la batalla de Eufrates II y nuestro destino estaban en sus manos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

traits.locale_text: El séquito d{mf|el|e la} Lord Capitán y la banda de Lobos Espaciales se adentraron en la galería, camino del corazón de la Catedral Máquina. Los vimos alejarse con reverencia mientras preparábamos un perímetro en torno a la entrada. Sabíamos que el verdadero resultado de la batalla de Eufrates II y nuestro destino estaban en sus manos.

languages.text: Das Gefolge des Lord Captains und das Rudel der Space Wolves stieg in den Schaft hinab und rückte in Richtung des Herzens der Maschinenkathedrale vor. Wir sahen ihnen mit Ehrfurcht in den Augen nach, während wir eine Schutzzone um den Eingang errichteten. Wir wussten, dass das wahre Ergebnis der Schlacht auf Eufrates II von ihnen abhing, und dass sie über unser Schicksal entscheiden würden.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's retinue and the Space Wolves band delved into the shaft, heading toward the heart of the Machine Cathedral. We watched them leave with reverence in our eyes as we were setting up a perimeter around the entrance. We knew that the true outcome of the battle of Eufrates II depended on them and that our fates were theirs to decide.

Wir wussten, dass das wahre Ergebnis der Schlacht auf Eufrates II von ihnen abhing, und dass sie über unser Schicksal entscheiden würden.
